alert.note: Alert for Latimer; Pittsburg (Oklahoma) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued August 08 at 6:21AM CDT until August 08 at 7:00AM CDT by NWS Tulsa
info.description: The National Weather Service in Tulsa has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southwestern Latimer County in southeastern Oklahoma... Southeastern Pittsburg County in southeastern Oklahoma... * Until 700 AM CDT. * At 621 AM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Alderson, moving southeast at 35 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations in or near the path include... Mcalester... Wilburton... Hartshorne... Krebs... Alderson... Higgins... Damon... Yanush... Mcalester Regional Airport... Haileyville... Gowen... Dow... Bache... HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
